last_episode_to_air.name: Time Cop
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the final episode ever! Minogue and O'Leary go back in time to the 90s but on returning, discover they've created an apocalyptic new timeline where Sarge was never a cop.

name: Wellington Paranormal
overview: New Zealand's capital is a hotbed of supernatural activity... so Officers Minogue and O'Leary, who featured in the vampire documentary What We Do In The Shadows, take to the streets to investigate all manner of paranormal phenomena.

episodes.name: Demon Girl
episodes.overview: Officers Minogue and O'Leary bring in what appears to be a projectile-vomiting drunk teenager. Sergeant Maaka delves deeper and invites the officers to join his Paranormal Unit.

episodes.name: Cop Circles
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary travel to the rural outskirts to investigate photographic evidence of a cow up a tree. Maaka suspects alien activity and sure enough, the two cops soon discover evidence.

guest_stars.character: Disorentated Farmer / Muzza / Bazza / Buzza / Bazza's Wife / Bazza's Son / Bazza's Daughter
guest_stars.name: Richard Dey

episodes.name: Things That Do The Bump In The Night
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary attend a noise complaint at what appears to be a 70s-themed party in Kandallah. But when they pull the plug on the record player, everyone disappears.

episodes.name: The She Wolf of Kurimarama Street
episodes.overview: Responding to a callout from a freaked out pizza delivery guy who was attacked by a big dog wearing jeans, Minogue and O'Leary soon discover that a werewolf is on the loose in Lower Hutt.

episodes.name: A Normal Night
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary encounter a series of incidents including a plastic bag mistaken for a ghost, some creepy clowns, some sort of ritual sacrifice, and a theft from the hospital blood bank.

episodes.name: Zombie Cops
episodes.overview: Fellow officers Donovan and Laupepe become infected by a zombie. Minogue and O'Leary must catch them before they get to Courtenay Place on a Friday night and start the zombie apocalypse.

episodes.name: Taniwha
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary head for the ocean when ten anglers disappear from around Wellington Harbour in mysterious circumstances.

episodes.name: Fear the Briannas
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary go back to school when three teen witches start threatening students at a local girls' high school. But they soon learn their teasing can be just as damaging as their magical powers.

episodes.name: Mt Vic Hooters
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary unwittingly free the ghost of an old fashioned cop from the 1930s. Can they stop him before he shuts every pub in Wellington for being open after 6pm closing time?

episodes.name: Copy Cops
episodes.overview: The discovery of a dead policeman that looks exactly like Minogue leads the cops to a creepy motel in the country full of exact copies of themselves. Although some of them aren't that exact.

episodes.name: Haunted Nissan
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary pull over a driverless 80s boy racer car only to discover it's haunted by the lovelorn ghost of the original owner. He's looking for his old girlfriend from 1989, but how will he react when he finds out she's moved on?

episodes.name: Mobots
episodes.overview: Out of date phones start forming into robots and terrorising the neighbourhood! Game of snake anyone?

episodes.name: Christmas Special
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary go out on a busy Christmas Eve Patrol. They find the Devil at a mall, deal with an interdimensional vortex at a barbecue, a discover a violent doll rampaging through a house.

episodes.name: Invisible Fiend
episodes.overview: After getting called out to a mysterious home invasion with no visible signs of entry, Minogue and O'Leary manage to arrest an invisible entity and bring it in for questioning.

episodes.name: Te Maero
episodes.overview: After finding footage of a camper being abducted by a large hairy creature, the cops decide to head for the bush.

episodes.name: Fear Factory
episodes.overview: The cops’ worst nightmares are realised when they encounter a shapeshifter who turns into the thing you fear the most.

episodes.name: The Sevens Ghosts
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary go searching for a group of ghostly rugby fans dressed as Where's Wally.

episodes.name: Revengers
episodes.overview: A meteor strike gives superpowers to a Neighbourhood Watch group who decide to take the law into their own hands; it's up to Minogue and O'Leary to take the law back.

episodes.name: Fatberg
episodes.overview: When a large, congealed blob of fat in the Wellington sewers becomes sentient, Minogue and O'Leary go underground to confront the monster.

episodes.name: Bird Woman
episodes.overview: Minogue and O'Leary tackle a half bird/half human that's been stealing shiny objects from around Wellington including the 'W' from the Wellington sign.

episodes.name: The Wicked Man
episodes.overview: When a not-so-young 'girl' goes missing, O'Leary and Minogue search for her on the mysterious Sales Island run by a weird goat-worshipping cult.

episodes.name: The Coolening
episodes.overview: After giving a talk at a high school, Minogue and O'Leary confiscate a haunted leather jacket that makes whoever wears it cool; something neither Minogue nor O'Leary are used to.

episodes.name: Skeleton Crew
episodes.overview: When workmen disturb a Pakeha burial ground underneath the police station, an annoying old Caucasian ghost possesses Sarge who then menaces his own officers.

episodes.name: Who The Hell?
episodes.overview: On a typical night patrol, Minogue and O'Leary get to the bottom of a series of mysterious curses while Officer Parker gets a new partner.

episodes.name: Time Cop
episodes.overview: It's the final episode ever! Minogue and O'Leary go back in time to the 90s but on returning, discover they've created an apocalyptic new timeline where Sarge was never a cop.
